timeline.message:
Add syntax support for CREATE MATERIALIZED VIEW

Make Presto parser support CREATE MATERIALIZED VIEW syntax, ex.

CREATE MATERIALIZED VIEW IF NOT EXISTS mv
COMMENT 'A simple materialized view'
WITH (
	partitioned_by = ARRAY['ds'],
	retention_days = 90
)
AS SELECT * FROM t

We do not support REPLACE MATERIALIZED VIEW at the moment,
since that is possible to trigger the entire view refresh.
Users could use DROP and CREATE a new materialzied view instead.

This commit rewrites a subset of
https://github.com/prestosql/presto/commit/88116a4a3fda92f0caa725d9b1a83e9b22f7dcf4
due to above reason.

Co-Authored-By: Anjali Norwood <52180099+anjalinorwood@users.noreply.github.com>
